title: Diagnose Intermittent Electrical Issue
description: A customer reports that their radio occasionally reboots for no reason. There are no active DTCs.

tasks.description: Schedule a service appointment and instruct the customer to note the time and date if the issue reoccurs.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent books an appointment and provides clear instructions for data gathering.

tasks.description: Once the vehicle is at the dealership, have a technician check for any available software updates for the infotainment module.
tasks.expected_outcome: Technician finds a Technical Service Bulletin (TSB) describing this issue, which is resolved by a software update.

tasks.description: Apply the software update and monitor the system to ensure the issue is resolved.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent updates the repair order to show the software was updated and the issue is resolved.
